alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gosper and Dawson Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Arnold to 6 miles west of Gothenburg to 6 miles northeast of Stockville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gothenburg around 910 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Willow Island, Cozad and Johnson Lake. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
